channel.title: Problems
channel.description: I am using the guide on here for starting up a server and I am stuck on the setting up Enviromental Variables. My OS is Windows 7 so could anyone help me with this?

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“coryallen1, post:5, topic:379315”]Your not understanding my problem I can find the PATH but not the CLASSPATH. Do I put them in the same thing or do I make a new variable for CLASSPATH if I dont already have one.

(I have never done this before and I am not very good with computers.)[/quote]
This is just a wild guess. Probably this won’t work, but maybe, MAYBE, make the classpath yourself? Seriously…

Read full topic

item.title: Problems
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

coryallen1:

I am using the guide on here for starting up a server and I am stuck on the setting up Enviromental Variables. My OS is Windows 7 so could anyone help me with this?

start button

right click “computer”

then properties

advanced system settings

On the advanced tab… you should see a button called environmental variables. You should be able to follow the do the tut now…

Read full topic
